scripts.dev: concurrently "parcel watch src/scripts/app.js --no-hmr --out-dir ./assets --out-file bundle.js" "npx postcss src/css/theme.css -o assets/theme.css --watch" "shopify theme dev --store=enzo-araujo-duarte.myshopify.com --password=shptka_1c16a311b076322faeeda4e315d9f650 --theme=150285353172"
scripts.start-windows: powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "concurrently \"parcel watch src/scripts/app.js --no-hmr --out-dir ./assets --out-file bundle.js\" \"npx postcss src/css/theme.css -o assets/theme.css --watch\" \"shopify theme dev --store=enzo-araujo-duarte.myshopify.com --password=shptka_1c16a311b076322faeeda4e315d9f650 --theme=150285353172\""
